branchCategory.name: VXB, Air Operated, Angle Seat Valve
branchCategory.description: <p>VXB series is an air operated valve for steam that utilizes angle seat structure to minimize pressure loss.  It is available with stainless steel 316L or bronze body material, and port size ranges from 3/8" to 3/4".  FKM seals are utilized to reduce leakage and provide long service life of over 3 million cycles (steam) or 5 million cycles (air)</p>

breadCrumb.name: VXB, Air Operated, Angle Seat Valve
